attributes.action: Rescind the ennoblement of Lord Nazir Ahmed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lord Nazir Ahmed has supported the Pakistani stance of insulting our country, our flag and our queen, and as such does not deserve to be a peer of the realm. He should be stripped of his title forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
